name: Love Is Alive
description:
• Arrow keys to move
  • X to pick up, swap a letter (on top of grid with desired letter)
  • Y to read, close a letter
  • X to read someone a letter (on top of the grid with desired person)
  • Refresh to start a new session

Use your best judgment for deciding if a letter contains healthy, "real" emotions. I am definitely NOT qualified to determine them.

Thanks for playing!!
